jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra Running: we like to run and we also like to have fun. Are we making Altra dog running shoes this season? No, we are not; it’s an Altra April’s Fool joke.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra Dog Shoes

image.alt: Green background with the words "Altra Dog Shoes" and "April Fool" over it and the head of a Pitbull on the right side of the image.

text.text:
We like to run and we like to have fun.

No, we don't make dog shoes. We continue to focus on what we're best at: making some of the most comfortable human shoes possible and supporting natural running.
 
So, if you're interested in a new pair, go ahead and take a look.
 
Oh, and to the dogs out there: You don't need shoes. You're perfect the way you are.
